entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
